statements.select: select isnull(sum(DetailsSum),0) from Pronotedetails where MPSDetailId=#value#

select * from Pronotedetails where InvoiceXOId in (select InvoiceXOId from InvoiceXO where (CustomerId in(select CustomerId from customer where (id>=#startcustomerid# or #startcustomerid# is null) and (id<= #endcustomerid# or #endcustomerid# is null)) )) and PronoteHeaderID in (select PronoteHeaderID from PronoteHeader where PronoteDate between #startdate# and #enddate# )
